languages.text: "Верно, эттфатер! Все на Фенрисе знают — ищущего великой доли подвергни великому испытанию! Многие наши герои покрыли себя славой, добровольно взяв суровейшие вызовы и показав свою доблесть".

traits.locale_text: "Верно, эттфатер! Все на Фенрисе знают — ищущего великой доли подвергни великому испытанию! Многие наши герои покрыли себя славой, добровольно взяв суровейшие вызовы и показав свою доблесть".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."
languages.original_text: "Верно, эттфатер! Все на Фенрисе знают — ищущего великой доли подвергни великому испытанию! Многие наши герои покрыли себя славой, добровольно взяв суровейшие вызовы и показав свою доблесть".

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

languages.text: «¡Qué razón tiene, Aett-Vater! Todo Fenris lo sabe: ¡quienes buscan un gran destino deben enfrentarse primero a una gran prueba! Muchos de nuestros héroes se cubrieron de gloria aceptando duros desafíos y demostrando su valor».
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué razón tiene, Aett-Vater! Todo Fenris lo sabe: ¡quienes buscan un gran destino deben enfrentarse primero a una gran prueba! Muchos de nuestros héroes se cubrieron de gloria aceptando duros desafíos y demostrando su valor».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「その通りだ、アエット＝ヴァテル！フェンリスの全員が知っている。偉大な運命を求める者は、まず偉大な試練に立ち向かわなければならない！多くの英雄たちは、過酷な試練を受け入れ、その勇気を証明することで、栄光を手にした」
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ、アエット＝ヴァテル！フェンリスの全員が知っている。偉大な運命を求める者は、まず偉大な試練に立ち向かわなければならない！多くの英雄たちは、過酷な試練を受け入れ、その勇気を証明することで、栄光を手にした」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你说得没错，狼领！芬里斯每个人都明白这个道理：追求伟大命运之人，必须先面对伟大的试炼！我们之中许多英雄都通过了严酷的挑战，证明了自己的英勇，赢得了荣耀。”
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，狼领！芬里斯每个人都明白这个道理：追求伟大命运之人，必须先面对伟大的试炼！我们之中许多英雄都通过了严酷的挑战，证明了自己的英勇，赢得了荣耀。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Aett-Vater! Auf Fenris wissen das alle: Wer nach einem großen Schicksal strebt, muss sich erst einer großen Prüfung stellen! Viele unserer Helden haben Ruhm erlangt, indem sie sich harten Herausforderungen gestellt und ihren Wert bewiesen haben."
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Aett-Vater! Auf Fenris wissen das alle: Wer nach einem großen Schicksal strebt, muss sich erst einer großen Prüfung stellen! Viele unserer Helden haben Ruhm erlangt, indem sie sich harten Herausforderungen gestellt und ihren Wert bewiesen haben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Bien dit, aett-vater ! Sur Fenris, tout le monde sait que celui qui aspire à un destin glorieux doit commencer par affronter une grande épreuve ! Nombre de nos héros sont entrés dans la légende en relevant de périlleux défis. »
languages.original_text: "Right you are, Aett-Vater! Everyone on Fenris knows: they who seek a great destiny must first face a great trial! Many of our heroes covered themselves in glory by accepting harsh challenges and proving their valour."

traits.locale_text: « Bien dit, aett-vater ! Sur Fenris, tout le monde sait que celui qui aspire à un destin glorieux doit commencer par affronter une grande épreuve ! Nombre de nos héros sont entrés dans la légende en relevant de périlleux défis. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
